name: Avolites Titan
description: PC version of the Titan software which runs on the Avolites desk. Free to use until version 11.4 although it spits out random data once in a while. Requires a dongle from version 12. ⚠ not free.

name: Chamsys MagicQ
description: MagiQ is a professional lighting software providing up to 64 Artnet universes for free. It includes powerful features like 2D/3D pixel mapping, effect generator, media server and visualizer.

name: Daslight
description: DMX lighting software for PC and Mac.

name: Dot2 software
description: Free, offline software for the Dot2 consoles. Includes Dot2 onPC and Dot2 3D.

name: EOS Family
description: Software for ETC's EOS-family consoles. ⚠ freemium.

name: Freestyler
description: Free lightning control software

name: GrandMA2 software
description: Free, offline software for the GrandMA2 lighting console. Includes GrandMA2 OnPC and MA3D. Does not output DMX for free. ⚠ freemium.

name: GrandMA3 software
description: Free, offline software for the new GrandMA3 lighting console. Includes GrandMA3 OnPC. Does not output DMX for free. ⚠ freemium.

name: Hog 4 software
description: Free, offline software for the Hog 4 lighting console. Includes Hog 4 pc. Does not output DMX for free. ⚠ freemium.

name: LightFactory
description: PC Lighting Control software witch also is the backend of the NEO Console. ⚠ not free.

name: ONYX
description: Modern lighting control system with alot of features.

name: QLC+
description: QLC+ is a free and cross-platform software to control DMX or analog lighting systems like moving heads, dimmers, scanners etc. Source Code ✓ open-source.

name: xLights
description: Meant for home Christmas light shows but is a great way to sync lights to music on a budget. Source Code ✓ open-source.

name: Capture
description: Documentation and visualisation software. Capture is a native macOS and Windows application that lets you work with lighting, video, laser, moving scenery and water effects. Does have a free Student Edition. ⚠ freemium.

name: Depence²
description: Depence² is a unique application, which combines the design and visualization process with the potential to control the real show. ⚠ not free.

name: Ma3D
description: Free lighting visualizer for GrandMA consoles/software.

name: wysiwyg
description: wysiwyg is an all-in-one lighting design software with fully integrated CAD, plots, data, visualization and virtual show control. ⚠ not free.

name: Audacity
description: Audio file editor and analysis tool, great for cropping down sound effects and music tracks. ✓ open-source.

name: Ardour
description: A full realtime audio recording and editing suite. Source Code ✓ open-source.

name: da-Share MultiPlay
description: MultiPlay is a Windows based program designed to play audio cues for theatre or corporate use. It is free to use.

name: Linux Show Player
description: Free cue player designed for stage productions. Source Code ✓ open-source.

name: QLab
description: QLab is sound, video, and lighting control for macOS. ⚠ freemium.

name: REAPER
description: REAPER is a complete digital audio production application for computers, offering a full multitrack audio and MIDI recording, editing, processing, mixing and mastering toolset. ⚠ freemium.

name: ARTA
description: A collection of programs for audio measurements and analysis.

name: REW
description: REW is free room acoustics analysis software for measuring and analysing room and loudspeaker responses. Free SMAART alternative.

name: Livescript
description: Insert a musical/theatre-script from Google Docs and use this for a live "autocue" and scroller with everyone on the site. ✓ open-source.

name: StageClock
description: StageClock is a Java based graphical timekeeping application. It outputs a clean feed from an attached monitor, and has time/date, timer, and show information. ⚠ freemium.

name: AutoCAD
description: AutoCAD® is computer-aided design (CAD) software that architects, engineers, and construction professionals rely on to create precise 2D and 3D drawings. ⚠ not free.

name: Vectorworks
description: Vectorworks is a versatile, on-premise application that provides extensive 2D drafting, 3D modeling, BIM and rendering capabilities for your architectural and landscape design needs. Also had a special entertainment version: Vectorworks Spotlight. ⚠ not free.

name: El-Tee-See
description: LTC wav file generator.

name: TCgenerator
description: Reaper time marker to GrandMA2 TC Generator. ✓ open-source.

name: Timecode
description: ArtNet and LTC timecode generator, made with Java. ✓ open-source.

name: Time MIDI sender
description: A free tool for sending time data to DasLight (via MIDI). ✓ open-source.

name: TimelordMTC
description: Advanced timecode management tool. ⚠ not free.

name: M2Q
description: Python application capable to trigger Chamsys Consoles/Software via MIDI for advanced synchronized shows. ✓ open-source.

name: AES67 WebMeter
description: Server that receives an AES67 audio stream and presents a webpage with meters. ✓ open-source.

name: meters.lv2
description: meters.lv2 is a collection of audio-level meters with GUI in LV2 plugin format. ✓ open-source.

name: Open Sound Meter
description: Clean, open-source sound meter. Supports RTA, magnitude, phase and impulse response, coherence, group delay and more. ✓ open-source.

name: Open Lighting Architecture
description: A framework for lighting control information. Supports a range of protocols and over a dozen of USB devices. Source Code

name: node-dmx
description: DMX controller library for Node.js. nodejs ✓ open-source.

name: artnet
description: Node.js module that can be used to send ArtDMX packages to an Art-Net node. nodejs.

name: artnet4j
description: Art-Net library for Java and Processing. java.

name: GIMP
description: GIMP is a cross-platform image editor available for Linux, Windows, and macOS.

name: Inkscape
description: Inkscape is a professional vector graphics editor for Linux, Windows and macOS.

name: Rentman
description: Cloud rental software for AV & Event companies. Resource planning, scheduling and more. ⚠ not free

name: Chamsys Programmers and Users facebook group
description: The best place to find information about Chamsys consoles and software.

name: Christian Jackson
description: YouTube channel about concert lighting. Also has great MA tutorials.

name: ESTA Technical Standards Program
description: Collection of technical standards in the entertainment technology industry.

name: Geezers of Gear
description: Entertainment Production Industry veteran talking about pro-audio, lighting, staging, video + the people and companies who work in this great industry.

name: @limelightwired
description: Lighting production community on Instagram.

name: awesome-linuxaudio
description: A Awesome list with all things Linux audio.

name: QLab Cookbook
description: The cookbook is a collection of projects, examples, and experiments using a broad range of QLab programming techniques including AppleScript, OSC, external control using QLab Remote, third-party MIDI and OSC controllers, and other software.

name: /r/lightingdesign
description: The Reddit community for lighting designers worldwide.

name: /r/techtheatre
description: The reddit community for all production designers and technicians!

name: mikewoodld.com/blog/
description: Blog of Lighting Designer Mike Wood.

name: notelek.com/blog/
description: LXR Stage Technology Blog.

name: GMA2 colour picker tutorial
description: A tutorial for how to add a colour picker in GrandMA2.

name: Blender ArtNet
description: Blender script to push ArtNet data to Evee lights. Runs at 30fps with Evee rendering in the viewport. ✓ open-source.

name: Linux
description: A free operating system that can run on pretty much every kind of computer and is great for breathing new life into old computers that aren't supported by the newer Windows editions. There's tons of different distributions to choose from,. The most common one for general computer stuff is Ubuntu. ✓ open-source.

name: MIDI Monster
description: MIDIMonster is a universal control and translation tool. It can translate between many different protocols such as MIDI, Artnet, sACN and OSC. ✓ open-source.

name: UsedLighting
description: Marketplace for buying/selling used lighting hardware.
